class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B000O6K8NY-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="zes6v3-9vagly-mo2brx-juzc6j"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; data-csa-c-id="syhxh6-o13vsm-gnqbyf-m3tf0s"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="5wlhal-i3x9qm-gxdudg-q8ff0c"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B000O6K8TI" data-csa-c-id="eavmov-xo4pug-vi75hk-o8mhqa"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-2"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/Organic-Valley-Pasteurized-Gallon-Ounces/dp/B000O6K8TI/ref=sr_1_2_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-2" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-2-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="fks9x3-rlotao-kx70m9-1aduhy"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B06ZYNZ7NF-trigger-0-0" aria-label="Learn more about USDA Organic" class="a-link-normal aok-inline-block" target="javascript:void(0)" rel="noopener" href="#" role="button"><div class="a-section s-margin-bottom-none aok-inline-block s-pc-attribute-pill s-pc-certification"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="" style="height: 24px; width: 24px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="24px" width="24px"/></noscript></div>  <div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-pc-attribute-pill-text s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base">USDA Organic</span></div></div><span class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B06ZYNZ7NF-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="mq4n2d-u4kozv-3ok80v-w227ty"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="wc4r1o-wdjmcm-tvc46g-yvtm84"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B06ZYNZ7NF" data-csa-c-id="kzi8jf-9konqh-7ge489-2ksqzj"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-3"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/mery-Grass-Organic-Whole-Supportibackl-248/dp/B06ZYNZ7NF/ref=sr_1_3_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-3" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-3-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B0BRBBX5B5-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="nvy705-wtrfig-frm5v4-bbmvqt"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="4weygs-bjkd0d-r0v6wi-faf4lb"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; data-csa-c-id="5gjmgh-2mjogn-izqx19-yg9qht"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="kggu77-gzdm37-35f8qo-55oyif"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B09FBL77P3" data-csa-c-id="y4x4xl-kbvt1a-mfdqyu-u6i044"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-6"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/365-WFM-Organic-Whole-Milk/dp/B09FBL77P3/ref=sr_1_6_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-6" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-6-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

class="a-spacing-none s-pc-expander-title a-text-bold">Organic content</h3></span></a><div id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBKTX32-ec-0" aria-labelledby="pc-side-sheet-B09FBKTX32-eh-0" aria-role="region" data-expanded="true" class="a-expander-content a-spacing-none a-expander-section-content a-section-expander-inner"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-small"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Product contains at least 95% organic material.</span></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">As certified by</span></div><div class="a-section s-pc-expander-certs s-pc-attribute s-pc-link-container"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="cxr9zl-he3p9c-xp5jdu-p1lc8s"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBKTX32-trigger-0-0" aria-label="Learn more about USDA Organic" class="a-link-normal aok-inline-block" target="javascript:void(0)" rel="noopener" href="#" role="button"><div class="a-section s-margin-bottom-none aok-inline-block s-pc-attribute-pill s-pc-certification"><span width="24px"/></noscript></div>  <div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-pc-attribute-pill-text s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base">USDA Organic</span></div></div><span class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBKTX32-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="y3ojar-ca68rp-gldpek-1nrk63"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="16vkwa-t1rett-k7io94-z9gfcw"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B09FBKTX32" data-csa-c-id="rit2dx-n8gy8w-nr8mvf-mwimae"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-9"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/365-Whole-Foods-Market-Ultra-Pasteurized/dp/B09FBKTX32/ref=sr_1_9_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-9" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-9-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

by</span></div><div class="a-section s-pc-expander-certs s-pc-attribute s-pc-link-container"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary="{&quot;ctDwellMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_st&quot;,&quot;preloadDomId&quot;:&quot;pc-side-sheet-B08KZ8RSHK-0-0&quot;,&quot;previousPreloadDomId&quot;:&quot;pc-side-sheet-B08KZ8RSHK&quot;,&quot;ctMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_cf&quot;}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="t16aw4-sbf1m1-42bdoi-pmnus7"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B08KZ8RSHK-trigger-0-0" aria-label="Learn more about USDA Organic" class="a-link-normal aok-inline-block" target="javascript:void(0)" rel="noopener" href="#" role="button"><div class="a-section s-margin-bottom-none aok-inline-block s-pc-attribute-pill s-pc-certification"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="" style="height: 24px; width: 24px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="24px" width="24px"/></noscript></div>  <div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-pc-attribute-pill-text s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base">USDA Organic</span></div></div><span class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B08KZ8RSHK-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="vz456r-8sybog-rvl1in-hg6lxm"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="k5qtp9-atucf1-p7v8gl-tp38dp"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B08KZ8RSHK" data-csa-c-id="n1iymd-88b5u3-klwqa3-fc7iv4"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-11"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/Alexandre-Dairy-Organic-Whole-Milk/dp/B08KZ8RSHK/ref=sr_1_11_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-11" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-11-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

class="a-size-base a-color-base">This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications.</span> </div><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div data-eometric="provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_eo" data-a-expander-name="pc_sidesheet_expander" class="a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-none a-expander-section-container a-section-expander-container"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W-eh-0" aria-controls="pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W-ec-0" aria-expanded="true" role="button" href="javascript:void(0)" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-expander-header a-declarative a-expander-section-header a-link-section-expander a-size-medium" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;}"><i class="a-icon a-icon-section-collapse"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt" role="heading" aria-level="5"><h3 class="a-spacing-none s-pc-expander-title a-text-bold">Organic content</h3></span></a><div id="pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W-ec-0" aria-labelledby="pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W-eh-0" aria-role="region" data-expanded="true" class="a-expander-content a-spacing-none a-expander-section-content a-section-expander-inner"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-small"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Product contains at least 95% organic material.</span></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">As certified by</span></div><div class="a-section s-pc-expander-certs s-pc-attribute s-pc-link-container"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary="{&quot;ctDwellMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_st&quot;,&quot;preloadDomId&quot;:&quot;pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W-0-0&quot;,&quot;previousPreloadDomId&quot;:&quot;pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W&quot;,&quot;ctMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_cf&quot;}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="8b0zn9-oz7q5v-3xy5cj-deaxq0"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W-trigger-0-0" aria-label="Learn more about USDA Organic" class="a-link-normal aok-inline-block" target="javascript:void(0)" rel="noopener" href="#" role="button"><div class="a-section s-margin-bottom-none aok-inline-block s-pc-attribute-pill s-pc-certification"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="" style="height: 24px; width: 24px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="24px" width="24px"/></noscript></div>  <div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-pc-attribute-pill-text s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base">USDA Organic</span></div></div><span class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B08LFMR89W-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="a5i024-6d4lc4-igyoo-mrf7uz"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="t0u7ii-k64tlx-lgr0ey-nf2wrg"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B08LFMR89W" data-csa-c-id="tqpn1h-9iufgn-zh49kc-5cc76s"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-12"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/Organic-Valley-Grassmilk-Free-Milk/dp/B08LFMR89W/ref=sr_1_12_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-12" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-12-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B073VMBD4W-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="qt41ey-ksrqws-gkgtnn-wrfua8"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B0BTN1VWW4-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="vryfdu-5urhdr-97p85r-uif5u5"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="mjovui-dcrxt4-m4jw69-7yj41n"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; class="a-size-base a-color-base">This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications.</span> </div><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div data-eometric="provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_eo" data-a-expander-name="pc_sidesheet_expander" class="a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-none a-expander-section-container a-section-expander-container"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394-eh-0" aria-controls="pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394-ec-0" aria-expanded="true" role="button" href="javascript:void(0)" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-expander-header a-declarative a-expander-section-header a-link-section-expander a-size-medium" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;}"><i class="a-icon a-icon-section-collapse"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt" role="heading" aria-level="5"><h3 class="a-spacing-none s-pc-expander-title a-text-bold">Organic content</h3></span></a><div id="pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394-ec-0" aria-labelledby="pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394-eh-0" aria-role="region" data-expanded="true" class="a-expander-content a-spacing-none a-expander-section-content a-section-expander-inner"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-small"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Product contains at least 95% organic material.</span></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">As certified by</span></div><div class="a-section s-pc-expander-certs s-pc-attribute s-pc-link-container"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary="{&quot;ctDwellMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_st&quot;,&quot;preloadDomId&quot;:&quot;pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394-0-0&quot;,&quot;previousPreloadDomId&quot;:&quot;pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394&quot;,&quot;ctMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_cf&quot;}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="eu8kvs-e6w8o6-qj76b7-zgcp46"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394-trigger-0-0" aria-label="Learn more about USDA Organic" class="a-link-normal aok-inline-block" target="javascript:void(0)" rel="noopener" href="#" role="button"><div class="a-section s-margin-bottom-none aok-inline-block s-pc-attribute-pill s-pc-certification"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="" style="height: 24px; width: 24px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="24px" width="24px"/></noscript></div>  <div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-pc-attribute-pill-text s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base">USDA Organic</span></div></div><span class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B081KJD394-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="kih042-gv38rb-efz8n3-1ruhb1"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="mx3c5b-juvtnc-k3djk6-xgkf0w"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B081KJD394" data-csa-c-id="hggxk5-1c0p6i-3c5pcl-jz6tts"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-16"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/Horizon-Organic-Whole-Choline-Growing/dp/B081KJD394/ref=sr_1_16_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-16" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-16-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

data-eometric="provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_eo" data-a-expander-name="pc_sidesheet_expander" class="a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-none a-expander-section-container class="a-spacing-none s-pc-expander-title a-text-bold">Organic content</h3></span></a><div id="pc-side-sheet-B081473FRX-ec-0" aria-labelledby="pc-side-sheet-B081473FRX-eh-0" aria-role="region" data-expanded="true" class="a-expander-content a-spacing-none a-expander-section-content a-section-expander-inner"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-small"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Product contains at least 95% organic material.</span></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">As certified by</span></div><div class="a-section s-pc-expander-certs s-pc-attribute s-pc-link-container"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="ovszur-biiklx-jrk13l-ko41br"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B081473FRX-trigger-0-0" aria-label="Learn more about USDA Organic" class="a-link-normal aok-inline-block" target="javascript:void(0)" rel="noopener" href="#" role="button"><div class="a-section s-margin-bottom-none aok-inline-block s-pc-attribute-pill s-pc-certification"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="" style="height: 24px; width: 24px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="24px" width="24px"/></noscript></div>  <div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-pc-attribute-pill-text s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base">USDA Organic</span></div></div><span class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B081473FRX-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="7ju4lu-jnggfk-nesa24-5med4k"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="2ljxwt-m12xjw-hvyi8-61lxsb"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B081473FRX" data-csa-c-id="1mgm3i-9p5sh3-npv9wm-a1b5bb"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-17"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/Organic-Whole-Valley-Pasteurized-Gallon/dp/B081473FRX/ref=sr_1_17_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-17" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-17-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

class="a-spacing-none s-pc-expander-title a-text-bold">Organic content</h3></span></a><div id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBLCW3R-ec-0" aria-labelledby="pc-side-sheet-B09FBLCW3R-eh-0" aria-role="region" data-expanded="true" class="a-expander-content a-spacing-none a-expander-section-content a-section-expander-inner"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-small"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Product contains at least 95% organic material.</span></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-mini"><span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">As certified by</span></div><div class="a-section s-pc-expander-certs s-pc-attribute s-pc-link-container"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="ly2fyw-w4bqf9-r5v0sa-u3osua"><a id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBLCW3R-trigger-0-0" aria-label="Learn more about USDA Organic" class="a-link-normal aok-inline-block" target="javascript:void(0)" rel="noopener" href="#" role="button"><div class="a-section s-margin-bottom-none aok-inline-block s-pc-attribute-pill s-pc-certification"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="" style="height: 24px; width: 24px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="24px" width="24px"/></noscript></div>  <div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-pc-attribute-pill-text s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base">USDA Organic</span></div></div><span class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBLCW3R-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="gq59b9-lefmx1-gu3ujo-qqgm5h"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="b477di-o766zr-rvd619-vrl75v"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B09FBLCW3R" data-csa-c-id="bridmi-epcfyz-kacgj4-l7ppwk"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-19"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/365-Whole-Foods-Market-Ultra-Pasteurized/dp/B09FBLCW3R/ref=sr_1_19_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-19" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-19-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>

class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBKSLH6-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="rn4ilp-2n3wf1-dfl342-5usb6v"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B08146YM2N-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="kqtho5-esznwd-fas32r-61xs5u"><button type="button" class="s-pc-detail-view-secondary-back" aria-label="Back to certifications for this product"><span class="s-pc-detail-view-back-icon s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="72bud2-lg63y5-bbiayv-5pybc4"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; class="aok-offscreen">Learn more about USDA Organic</span></a></span><div id="pc-side-sheet-B09FBK2H44-0-0" aria-hidden="true" class="a-section aok-hidden"><div class="s-pc-container-side-sheet s-margin-bottom-none"><div class="a-section a-spacing-base"><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-sidesheet-secondary-back" data-csa-c-type="widget" s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="s0t8y8-on3h7p-7h18yq-d8c2cc"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; aok-block"></span></button></span><div class="a-section a-spacing-none s-pc-certification"><div alt="" style="height: 36px; width: 36px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png"><noscript><img alt="" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31P6BHLM8wL._SS200_.png" height="36px" width="36px"/></noscript></div> <h2 class="a-spacing-none a-size-medium a-text-bold">USDA Organic</h2></div></div></div><hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"><div class="a-section"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">USDA Organic certified products are required to be produced using farming practices that maintain and improve soil and water quality, reduce the use of synthetic materials, conserve biodiversity, and avoid genetic engineering, among other factors. Crops can be certified organic if they're grown without prohibited substances such as most synthetic fertilizers and pesticides for three years prior to harvest. Livestock are raised on pastures and treated humanely without growth hormones or antibiotics. Organic products do not contain GMOs or artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. USDA Organic products contain a minimum of 95% organic ingredients and use the USDA Organic seal.</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="a-section s-pc-sticky-footer"><a class="a-link-normal s-underline-text s-underline-link-text s-link-style" href="/climatepledgefriendly"><span class="a-declarative" data-version-id="v2dedio7i062j12oa38qtc8evog" data-render-id="r1r4qwupt21wx12wldhot67q5a9" data-action="s-pc-program-footer" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-s-pc-program-footer" data-s-pc-program-footer="{&quot;clickMetric&quot;:&quot;provenanceCertifications_desktop_cpf_badge_lmlk&quot;,&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true}" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-id="7453xj-jpsi8b-m3m335-5tmsp5"><div class="a-section s-pc-program-name"><div aria-level="2" class="a-section a-spacing-none" role="heading"><span class="faceout-image-view"></span><div alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" style="height: 24px; width: 186px;" class="a-image-wrapper a-lazy-loaded a-manually-loaded s-image" data-a-image-source="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg"><noscript><img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/21AGu0JFvKL.svg" height="24px" width="186px"/></noscript></div> </div><div class="a-section aok-inline-block aok-align-center s-margin-bottom-none"><span class="a-size-base a-color-base">Discover more products with sustainability features.</span> <span class="a-size-base a-color-link">Learn more</span></div></div></span></a> </div></div></div></div><div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-mini"><div class="puis-see-details-content"><div data-csa-c-type="action" data-csa-c-content-id="s-search-see-details-button" data-csa-c-device-type="DESKTOP" data-csa-c-device-env="WEB" data-csa-c-device-os="UNRECOGNIZED" data-csa-c-item-type="asin" data-csa-c-item-id="B09FBKM5FP" data-csa-c-id="rrjhqb-e0bqtg-tbg41s-qu7052"><span class="a-button a-button-base" id="a-autoid-27"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="/365-WFM-Organic-Whole-Milk/dp/B09FBKM5FP/ref=sr_1_27_so_DAIRY_BASED_DRINK?crid=WDZ97TIPKACB&amp;dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.y0qFUJJ_OwQlCpSYw-vripOLXYe7o_6A0vvZ037Tu9GcGqdm2X3YQhA9vYQUvAbCfxQDtle6WUTKpcWydxs8SQ7knlAQkT7PraUYcTM5l6zgiNvYGo-Mh4_TP-yPQNaoK19BUwJRm8HXqLkBpjAAGQNfGd4A2s1dVRpMg5SUk0pdC73f8I7sdQJKHmeZZCXglbTqypmqPV2pgwFkjcSQOsXp0bmvnTQEA_hxaTyl39Q6ySUNAZH3S7NJibzHIGs6tWhL1hdiKbOuE0DwDbNnSIBnjsQctTY1aN9qphAhHN0.wVTljbLYAinlhtjkZ80AzDeGleN3mdFAi8xeZPfNSEI&amp;dib_tag=se&amp;keywords=milk&amp;qid=1755620255&amp;sprefix=%2Caps%2C71&amp;sr=8-27" class="a-button-text" id="a-autoid-27-announce">See options</a></span></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></span></div></div>
